column2: Requirement summary (verify against official text)
column5: Design / Risk controls (summary)
column6: Verification & Validation evidence (doc IDs / tests)

column2: Safety and performance: devices achieve intended performance and are safe; benefit-risk acceptable.
column5: Claim set A; quality gating; risk management; conservative labeling.
column6: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
column10: Execute V&V and attach test logs; finalize residual risk after pilot if needed

column2: Risk reduction: eliminate/reduce risks as far as possible; protective measures; information for safety.
column5: Quality score; artifact detection; warnings; IFU; usability validation.
column6: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
column10: Execute V&V and attach test logs; finalize residual risk after pilot if needed

column2: Risk management process must be applied throughout lifecycle.
column5: ISO 14971 process integrated with change control.
column6: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
column10: Execute V&V and attach test logs; finalize residual risk after pilot if needed

column2: Performance characteristics and risk controls remain effective during lifetime.
column5: Release/update policy; regression suite; PMS monitoring.
column6: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
column10: Execute V&V and attach test logs; finalize residual risk after pilot if needed

column2: Characteristics and performance not adversely affected by transport/storage conditions (as applicable).
column4: Software distribution; ensure integrity and compatibility across iOS versions.
column5: Signed binaries; compatibility checks; installation requirements.
column6: Software-only product: transport/storage mostly N/A; verify device compatibility and environment assumptions via labeling
column10: Confirm any storage/transport constraints (if distributing as app only)

column2: Protection against risks from use error; ergonomic features; use environment.
column5: AR acquisition wizard; privacy-by-design; human factors validation.
column6: HFE/Usability Engineering File + URRA + Summative validation plan/report + IFU/labeling + quality gating
column10: Run formative + summative usability sessions; compile final summative report

column2: Consideration of intended users and their training; lay users if applicable.
column5: Two modes (home/clinical); user instructions; UI warnings.
column6: HFE/Usability Engineering File + URRA + Summative validation plan/report + IFU/labeling + quality gating
column10: Run formative + summative usability sessions; compile final summative report

column2: Devices must be designed so that risks associated with use in intended conditions are removed or minimized.
column5: Noise/motion detection; not-in-water classifier; gating.
column6: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
column10: Execute V&V and attach test logs; finalize residual risk after pilot if needed

column2: Manufacturers must reduce risks related to reasonably foreseeable environmental conditions.
column5: Toilet scan normalization; pour calibration; multi-toilet dataset; quality thresholds.
column6: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
column10: Execute V&V and attach test logs; finalize residual risk after pilot if needed

column2: Chemical, physical and biological properties (as applicable).
column5: N/A

column2: Construction and environmental properties (as applicable).
column4: Software-only; reliance on smartphone hardware environment.
column5: Define operating conditions; handle low-light/noise; fail-safe behavior.
column6: Partial applicability (software construction/environment): see software architecture, SoUP, release policy
column10: Finalize compatibility list (supported iPhone/iOS) and include in IFU

column2: Protection against radiation (as applicable).
column5: N/A
column6: Not applicable for standalone software (no biological/medicinal/radiation components).

column2: Electronic programmable systems and software: lifecycle, validation, risk control, cybersecurity.
column5: IEC 62304-aligned SDLC; V&V; cybersecurity engineering; SBOM; secure updates.
column6: Software lifecycle (IEC 62304-aligned) + V&V + SoUP + cybersecurity engineering file + SBOM + security testing + change control for ML
column10: Execute security tests and V&V; complete unresolved anomalies log; ensure change control evidence for ML updates

column2: Devices with measuring function: accuracy, precision, limits, metrological traceability (as applicable).
column5: Bench verification with weight reference; acceptance criteria; calibration procedures.
column6: Measuring function: bench + clinic method-comparison + acceptance criteria + golden dataset plan + calibration protocol + QS gating
column10: Collect and freeze golden dataset; run BA analysis; update CER/CSR with results

column2: Protection against mechanical risks and related to devices supplied with energy (as applicable).
column4: Smartphone is external; ensure safe instructions for placement (avoid falls/water damage).
column5: Use instructions; warning labels; do not require mains power.
column6: Partial applicability; software-only device. Address via labeling, environment assumptions, and iPhone platform constraints.
column10: Confirm environmental constraints and include in IFU; verify no additional supplied hardware

column2: Protection against thermal risks (as applicable).
column4: Phone heating may affect capture; ensure time limits and safe operation.
column5: Limit capture duration; handle thermal throttling; quality flags.
column6: Partial applicability; software-only device. Address via labeling, environment assumptions, and iPhone platform constraints.
column10: Confirm environmental constraints and include in IFU; verify no additional supplied hardware

column2: Protection against risks posed by devices intended for use by lay persons (as applicable).
column5: Clear instructions; warnings; privacy; minimize incorrect use.
column6: HFE/Usability Engineering File + URRA + Summative validation plan/report + IFU/labeling + quality gating
column10: Run formative + summative usability sessions; compile final summative report

column2: Information supplied with device: labels, IFU, safety information, performance, compatibility.
column5: IFU includes acquisition protocol, limitations, quality indicators, supported devices.
column6: IFU + labeling/claims alignment + sample report + compatibility list + warnings and quality gating
column10: Finalize IFU and supported device list; align translations

column2: Post-market surveillance and vigilance (as applicable).
column5: PMS plan; complaint handling; cybersecurity monitoring; trend reporting; PMCF.
column6: PMS plan + PMCF plan + PSUR template + vigilance workflow + complaint/CAPA registers
column10: Define PMS KPIs and reporting cadence; start PMS logging at pilot launch
